meta.description: Enhanced SPICE integration for linux QEMU guest

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 only

meta.long_description:
Spice agent for linux guests offering
* Client mouse mode
* Copy and paste
* Automatic adjustment of the X-session resolution
  to the client resolution
* Multiple displays
meta.name: spice-vdagent
